languages.text: "Разум туманен, глаз слеп, а ухо глухо. Но кровь не врет. Ангел Его сразил демонов. А уж своих или наших — не важно".
"The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
languages.original_text: "Разум туманен, глаз слеп, а ухо глухо. Но кровь не врет. Ангел Его сразил демонов. А уж своих или наших — не важно".

traits.locale_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
"The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
"The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
"The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
"The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

languages.text: "Der Verstand ist getrübt, das Auge blind, und das Ohr taub, doch Blut lügt nicht. Sein Engel hat Dämonen getötet, seine eigenen oder unsere, das ist gleichgültig."
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: "Der Verstand ist getrübt, das Auge blind, und das Ohr taub, doch Blut lügt nicht. Sein Engel hat Dämonen getötet, seine eigenen oder unsere, das ist gleichgültig."

languages.text: « L'esprit est embrumé, l'œil aveugle et l'oreille sourde, mais le sang ne ment pas. Son ange a tué des démons... les siens ou les nôtres, peu importe. »
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit est embrumé, l'œil aveugle et l'oreille sourde, mais le sang ne ment pas. Son ange a tué des démons... les siens ou les nôtres, peu importe. »

languages.text: «La mente está nublada, el ojo ciego y el oído sordo, pero la sangre no miente. Su Ángel mató daemons... da igual si los suyos propios o los nuestros».
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: «La mente está nublada, el ojo ciego y el oído sordo, pero la sangre no miente. Su Ángel mató daemons... da igual si los suyos propios o los nuestros».

languages.text: 「心は曇り、目は見えず、耳は聞こえないが、血は嘘をつかない。彼の天使はディーモンたちを殺した。彼のものであろうと、我々のものであろうと、どうでもいいわ」
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: 「心は曇り、目は見えず、耳は聞こえないが、血は嘘をつかない。彼の天使はディーモンたちを殺した。彼のものであろうと、我々のものであろうと、どうでもいいわ」

languages.text: “他的心灵没有反应，目不视物，耳不闻声，但鲜血不会说谎。不死之神的天使杀死了恶魔，无论是哪里来的恶魔都不重要。”
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

traits.locale_text: “他的心灵没有反应，目不视物，耳不闻声，但鲜血不会说谎。不死之神的天使杀死了恶魔，无论是哪里来的恶魔都不重要。”

languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."

languages.text: "Zihin bulanıktır, göz kördür ve kulak sağırdır fakat kan yalan söylemez. O'nun Meleği, iblisleri kesip biçer. Kendi iblisleri ya da bizim iblislerimiz olması fark etmez."
languages.original_text: "The mind is clouded, the eye blind, and the ear deaf, but blood does not lie. His Angel slew daemons — his own or ours, it does not matter."
